posts.title: First post
posts.body: This is my first post. It will be just the first of many heartbreaking works of staggering genius.

posts.title: whatever
posts.body: Get over yourself Ethan. Really? Heartbreaking work of staggering genius? [vomits]

posts.title: more thoughts
posts.body: JavaScript has a very odd syntax when compared to some other programming languages, doesn't it? Wait until we learn Ruby; it's like writing plain English sometimes. Other times it makes me want to hurl things at the wall, though.

posts.title: Random musings
posts.body: Penguins are truly silly birds on land and remarkably graceful in the water.
